title: Digital Storytelling-Based Professional Identity Formation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, incorporating characteristics of job seekers, and enhancing learning through peer feedback and self-reflection.

learning_goals: Learners can create a 3-minute personal narrative reflecting professional competencies using digital storytelling tools (mobile apps/platforms)
Learners can analyze peers' digital storytelling works and provide three or more types of feedback on professional identity formation processes
Learners can describe five core elements of professional identity discovered during digital storytelling activities through reflective journals

resources: Digital Storytelling Creation Guide Video in LMS
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
